title: Low Elo Climbing
body:
Be at least Bronze 3-Bronze 1
Looking for a  Duo.
requirements: must have been above bronze before season 7
Not toxic
be able to play all 5 roles if needed
Have Discord
Have over a 60% WinRate

replies.body: This dude is pure toxic, played a game with him he went 3/15 and I don't even mind it, but as soon as I go 9/12/19 he loses it. Very toxic player. I would recommend letting him sit in Bronze where he belongs.

> [{quoted}](name=Jack1029man,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=0Mufob7l,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-11T02:49:14.522+0000)
>
> This dude is pure toxic, played a game with him he went 3/15 and I don't even mind it, but as soon as I go 9/12/19 he loses it. Very toxic player. I would recommend letting him sit in Bronze where he belongs.

I mean wtf  why did you add him XD Its funny a bronze asking for a 60 % WINRATE.....

> [{quoted}](name=Herny knock down,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=0Mufob7l,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-02-11T02:53:34.904+0000)
>
> I mean wtf  why did you add him XD Its funny a bronze asking for a 60 % WINRATE.....

I have been looking for a duo partner to queue with and not only does he absolutely suck in mechanics he is sooooo toxic. In that game I dealt 8k more damage then him and he just starts flaming be saying I suck at that champion and it's my fault that he didn't get in his promos. Just warning everyone who wants to duo with him. Like bro its my fault that you even were close to promos by carrying his 3/15 match before.

I'm Interested, I have a 59.6% win rate, much higher with my main champions. I have discord. I play all roles but adc. I main mid and top lane though. Wasn't above Bronze before, this is really my first season of actually playing ranked, but I have strong skills and a high lane win rate.
Edit: Bronze 2 currently.
